templates.template: Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP
templates.name: Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP
templates.description:
This template is designed to monitor Microsoft Azure PostgreSQL flexible servers by HTTP.
It works without any external scripts and uses the script item.

Setup:
  1. Create an Azure service principal via the Azure command-line interface (Azure CLI) for your subscription.
    `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name zabbix --role reader --scope /subscriptions/<subscription_id>`
    See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cli/azure/create-an-azure-service-principal-azure-cli for more details.
  2. Link the template to a host.
  3. Configure the macros: {$AZURE.APP.ID}, {$AZURE.PASSWORD}, {$AZURE.TENANT.ID}, {$AZURE.SUBSCRIPTION.ID}, and {$AZURE.RESOURCE.ID}.

You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/

Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

items.name: Availability status detailed
items.description: The summary description of the availability status.

items.name: Availability state
items.description: The availability status of the resource.

triggers.expression: last(/Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP/azure.db.pgsql.availability.state)=1
triggers.name: PostgreSQL server is degraded
triggers.description: The resource is in degraded state.

triggers.expression: last(/Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP/azure.db.pgsql.availability.state)=3
triggers.name: PostgreSQL server is in unknown state

triggers.expression: last(/Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP/azure.db.pgsql.availability.state)=2
triggers.name: PostgreSQL server is unavailable

items.name: Connections active
items.description: The count of active connections.

items.name: Connections failed
items.description: The count of failed connections.

items.name: Connections succeeded
items.description: The count of succeeded connections.

items.name: CPU credits consumed
items.description: The total number of credits consumed by the database server.

items.name: CPU credits remaining
items.description: The total number of credits available to burst.

items.name: Percentage CPU
items.description: The CPU percent of a host.

triggers.name: High CPU utilization
triggers.description: The CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

items.name: Get errors
items.description: A list of errors from API requests.

triggers.expression: length(last(/Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server by HTTP/azure.db.pgsql.data.errors))>0
triggers.name: There are errors in requests to API
triggers.description: Zabbix has received errors in response to API requests.

items.name: Get data
items.description: The result of API requests is expressed in the JSON.

items.name: Data disk read Bps
items.description: Bytes read per second from the data disk during the monitoring period.

items.name: Data disk write Bps
items.description: Bytes written per second to the data disk during the monitoring period.

items.name: Data disk queue depth
items.description: The number of outstanding I/O operations to the data disk.

items.name: Data disk IOPS
items.description: I/O operations per second.

items.name: Data disk read IOPS
items.description: The number of the data disk I/O read operations per second.

items.name: Data disk write IOPS
items.description: The number of the data disk I/O write operations per second.

items.name: Memory utilization
items.description: The memory percent of a host.

triggers.name: High memory utilization
triggers.description: The system is running out of free memory.

items.name: Network out
items.description: The network outbound traffic across the active connections.

items.name: Network in
items.description: The network inbound traffic across the active connections.

items.name: Backup storage used
items.description: Used backup storage, expressed in bytes.

items.name: Storage free
items.description: Free storage space, expressed in bytes.

items.name: Storage percent
items.description: The storage utilization, expressed in %.

triggers.name: Storage space is critically low
triggers.description: Critical utilization of the storage space.

triggers.name: Storage space is low
triggers.description: High utilization of the storage space.

items.name: Transaction log storage used
items.description: The storage space used by transaction log, expressed in bytes.

items.name: Storage used
items.description: Used storage space, expressed in bytes.

items.name: Maximum used transaction IDs
items.description: The maximum number of used transaction IDs.

macros.description: The App ID of Microsoft Azure.
The critical threshold of CPU utilization, expressed in %.
The critical threshold of memory utilization, expressed in %.
The critical threshold of storage utilization, expressed in %.
The warning threshold of storage utilization, expressed in %.
Sets HTTP proxy value. If this macro is empty then no proxy is used.
